text: Renjong LRT Station is an LRT station in Sengkang, Singapore. It opened on January 2005. At the same time, the east loop of Punggol LRT Line opened. ==Name== There was a road called Lorong Rending near the station, so the station got its name from the road. ==Sources== ==Other websites== *SBS Transit Website Category:Sengkang Category:Light Rail Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Renjong LRT Station
